name: IdlePoker ver 0.0.2
description:
Hi, I’m a very beginner game developer who really like playing idle games :D

Also, I really like doing gambles and I thought whether I could integrate “Poker” into idle games.

Here’s my progress, though it’s just a prototype and a gameplay experience may be a bit weird lol

The game starts with just a 1 card, you earn chips, and expand the cards (even more than 5!). I also implemented other contents including “Challenge”, “Fever Mode”, and “High and low”. But I don’t know whether they are interacted with each other well. So I would be so happy if you give me any feedback or ideas!!

Feel free to join my discord and let's talk!

Discord : https://discord.gg/jaZNjfctRZ
